_header: If thou my true lover will be
Subjects: illustrations, verses accompanying; Christ, appeal of, to man
_description: A couplet on a scroll attached to a picture of the Christ Child in the lap of the Virgin

BLAdd37049.Transcription: If þou my trewe lufer wil be…
